entries.name: frontend-design-system:accessibility-auditor
entries.intent: Audit and fix accessibility issues in components and themes

entries.name: frontend-design-system:component-designer
entries.intent: Design and generate accessible React components with consistent styling

entries.name: frontend-design-system:design-architect
entries.intent: Strategic design decisions, style selection, and design system architecture

entries.name: frontend-design-system:responsive-specialist
entries.intent: Implement responsive layouts and mobile-first design patterns

entries.name: frontend-design-system:style-implementer
entries.intent: Implements selected design styles into production CSS/Tailwind/styled-components code

entries.name: frontend-design-system:theme-engineer
entries.intent: Multi-tenant theming with Keycloak realm integration and design token management
